name: Meow
tagline: some Rust testing and benchmarking stuff
body:
### Meow
This repository contains several things I've used for Rust testing.

* Inside `src/strings/` there are some older tools, one of which relies on the lolcat bible for benchmarking.
* At `src/testloop.rs` there's source for **testloop**, a tool for TDD in Rust.  Running the following gives you constant feedback when you change a `*.rs` file under the directory of the crate file given, for example, under `src/`:
```sh
make
./bin/testloop src/demo.rs
```

I've also got the beginnings of a presentation about this [here](slides/lightning-2013-12.md).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
